attribute.name: Uuid
attribute.semantics: DDCA Client/Master UUID

attribute.name: Name
attribute.semantics: User friendly name.

attribute.name: State
attribute.semantics: Current DDCA state

attribute.name: DdcaCompatibilityLevel
attribute.semantics: Client applications compatibility level for DDCA interoperability

objectClass.name: IRCUser
objectClass.semantics: Represents core data held in an IRC Server.

attribute.name: UserId
attribute.semantics: Unique ID for this IRC User.

attribute.name: UserNick
attribute.semantics: IRC Nickname for the user.

attribute.name: Channels
attribute.semantics: List of channels that are active in the server.

objectClass.name: DCSSBaseObject
objectClass.semantics: Base object for all derived DCSS object classes

objectClass.name: WallclockTime
objectClass.semantics: Represents the wallclock and simulation times.

attribute.name: ZuluTime
attribute.semantics: Zulu wallclock time

attribute.name: SimulationTime
attribute.semantics: Simulation time of day.

attribute.name: SimulationElapsedTime
attribute.semantics: Time in milliseconds since the start of the simulation.

attribute.name: ScalingFactor
attribute.semantics: Multiplier for clock time, e.g. 2x speed, 0.5x speed.

attribute.name: SimulationStartTime
attribute.semantics: Clock time when the simulation started.

attribute.name: ClockState
attribute.semantics: State of clock - started, paused or in an error state.

objectClass.name: WeatherInstance
objectClass.semantics: Provides information about a weather instance

attribute.name: Id
attribute.semantics: Weather instance unique identifier

attribute.name: Name
attribute.semantics: The name of the weather instance

attribute.name: Description
attribute.semantics: An optional description of the weather instance

attribute.name: InstanceType
attribute.semantics: Describes the weather instance type. Real instances are created from historical weather data. Live instances are created from current and forecast weather data and are automatically updated as weather data is published. Standard weather instances are based on a standard atmosphere model and contain user-specified basic weather conditions

attribute.name: GeoArea
attribute.semantics: Rectangular geographic area defined by lower left and upper right coordinates.

attribute.name: GeoAreaType
attribute.semantics: Describes the type of a GeoArea. Currently only the Polygon type is supported

attribute.name: StartTime
attribute.semantics: The earliest time at which the instance can be queried

attribute.name: EndTime
attribute.semantics: The latest time at which the instance can be queried

attribute.name: Domains
attribute.semantics: List of weather Domains

attribute.name: Active
attribute.semantics: Flag to show if this is the active weather instance, i.e. weather requests will be queried against this instance/

objectClass.name: WeatherObserver
objectClass.semantics: Encapsulates an object that is viewing the weather from a given location.

attribute.name: ObserverID
attribute.semantics: Unique, fixed ID identifying this WeatherObserver,

attribute.name: InstanceID
attribute.semantics: The weather instance associated with this observer.

attribute.name: Area
attribute.semantics: The area of interest for weather data points.

attribute.name: Altitude
attribute.semantics: Altitude AMSL for the data grid, m.

attribute.name: TimeOffset
attribute.semantics: Time to query since the start of the instance, s.

attribute.name: NumSamplesX
attribute.semantics: Number of grid samples in the x (latitude) direction. Must be greater than one.

attribute.name: NumSamplesY
attribute.semantics: Number of grid samples in the y (longitude) direction. Must be greater than one.

attribute.name: Elements
attribute.semantics: Array of the weather data elements that should be updated by the corresponding WeatherGriddedData object.

objectClass.name: WeatherGriddedData
objectClass.semantics: Represents an area of weather data, subdivided into a number of grid cells.

attribute.name: ObserverID
attribute.semantics: The ID of the associated WeatherObserver

attribute.name: InstanceID
attribute.semantics: The weather instance that contains the data for this object.

attribute.name: Area
attribute.semantics: Area covered by data.

attribute.name: Altitude
attribute.semantics: Altitude AMSL for the data grid, m.

attribute.name: TimeOffset
attribute.semantics: Time of query in from start of the instance, seconds.

attribute.name: NumSamplesX
attribute.semantics: Number of grid samples in the x (latitude) direction. Must be greater than one.

attribute.name: NumSamplesY
attribute.semantics: Number of grid samples in the y (longitude) direction. Must be greater than one.

attribute.name: DateTime
attribute.semantics: Date time of gridded weather data.

attribute.name: Resolution
attribute.semantics: Resolution of gridded data, degrees.

attribute.name: DataElements
attribute.semantics: An array of GriddedDataElements containing all the gridded data, one GriddedDataElement per type of data.

objectClass.name: DCSS_Munition
objectClass.semantics: A munition entity with added identification information.

attribute.name: Callsign
attribute.semantics: The name of the object.

attribute.name: Status
attribute.semantics: If an instance shall be taken into account by federates.

attribute.name: Activity
attribute.semantics: The activity of the munition.

objectClass.name: DCSS_Expendables
objectClass.semantics: An expendable (chaff or flare) entity with added identification information.

attribute.name: Callsign
attribute.semantics: The name of the object.

attribute.name: Status
attribute.semantics: The status of the object.

attribute.name: Activity
attribute.semantics: The activity of the object.

attribute.name: UniqueID
attribute.semantics: The unique ID for this object.

interactionClass.name: UpdateInhibitedMidsPairing
interactionClass.semantics: Request for calculation of degradation effects

interactionClass.name: MessageHeader
interactionClass.semantics: A common message header with the following information, used by all DDCA messages.

parameter.name: SessionID
parameter.semantics: UUID of the DDCA Session ID

parameter.name: SenderID
parameter.semantics: UUID of the sending application

parameter.name: ReceiverID
parameter.semantics: UUID of the receiving application

parameter.name: MessageType
parameter.semantics: Enumeration of message types (some protocols/interfaces may require this in order to process)

parameter.name: MessageSize
parameter.semantics: Length of the message (some protocols/interfaces may require this in order to process), in bytes. This value represents the length of the message, including the message header

parameter.name: MessageID
parameter.semantics: Unique (by sender) message id. The sender of the message shall maintain a unique message ID value, and shall increment this value by 1 for each message it sends.

parameter.name: DebriefTime
parameter.semantics: Wall clock Zulu time of the DDCA message creation, in milliseconds since January 01, 1970. May be used by Client applications to determine message ordering or to compute network latency

interactionClass.name: DdcaMasterInteraction
interactionClass.semantics: Represents a DDCA master message.

interactionClass.name: Load
interactionClass.semantics: The Load Control message is used to load recordings for playback. Recordings are identified by Session ID. The Load Control message can only be processed from a Client application’s READY state and enables the Client application’s entry into the STOP state.

parameter.name: StartDataTime
parameter.semantics: DataTime corresponding to the beginning of the playback window. DataTime field represents the date/time at which the data was created (in milliseconds since January 01, 1970)

parameter.name: EndDataTime
parameter.semantics: DataTime corresponding to the end of the playback window. DataTime field represents the date/time at which the data was created (in milliseconds since January 01, 1970)

interactionClass.name: Close
interactionClass.semantics: The Close Control message instructs Client application(s) to free or release any resources such as files, videos, etc. in use as a result of a previous Load control message. Upon receipt of the Close Control message, a Client application shall cease any operations currently in progress, and shall unload any file(s) that are currently loaded and transition into the READY state.

interactionClass.name: Sync
interactionClass.semantics: Instructs Client application(s) to perform Play, Stop, Pause, and Seek operations. Sync will be sent out at periodic intervals.

parameter.name: Purpose
parameter.semantics: Purpose of the sync operation: Play, Stop, Pause, or Seek

parameter.name: CurrentTime
parameter.semantics: DataTime corresponding to a specific data time within the playback window. DataTime represents the date/time at which the data was created (in milliseconds since January 01, 1970)

parameter.name: Speed
parameter.semantics: The requested playback speed

parameter.name: TimeType
parameter.semantics: Whether the time is a time of day or an offset from the current time.

interactionClass.name: Join
interactionClass.semantics: The Join Control message enables the Master application to instruct a Client application to join a DDCA event by referencing its ClientID. A Client application that accepts a Join Control message transitions from the UNJOINED state to the READY state.

parameter.name: ClientID
parameter.semantics: Unique identifier of the Client application

interactionClass.name: Leave
interactionClass.semantics: Instructs that a particular Client or Client application(s) leave a DDCA event

parameter.name: ClientID
parameter.semantics: Unique identifier of the Client application

interactionClass.name: List
interactionClass.semantics: Instructs Client application(s) to list all available recordings. The List Control message can occur from the READY state and keeps the Client in the READY state.

parameter.name: StartDataTime
parameter.semantics: DataTime corresponding to the beginning of the search window. DataTime field represents the date/time at which the data was created (in milliseconds since January 01, 1970)

parameter.name: EndDataTime
parameter.semantics: DataTime corresponding to the end of the search window. DataTime field represents the date/time at which the data was created (in milliseconds since January 01, 1970)

parameter.name: SearchType
parameter.semantics: Specifies the search type

interactionClass.name: RequestStatus
interactionClass.semantics: The Request Status Request message enables the Master application to request the status of Client application(s). The Request Status Request message may occur in any state, and enables no state transitions. Client applications that receive a Request Status message should respond to the message sender with their current status.

parameter.name: MasterID
parameter.semantics: Unique identifier of the master application

interactionClass.name: DDCACompatibility
interactionClass.semantics: The DDCACompatibility Request message is issued by the Master application to request a Client application to report its compatibility level for DDCA interoperability. This field exists to support growth and expansion of the DDCA standard.

parameter.name: Compatibility
parameter.semantics: Enumerated value representing DDCA compatibility level

interactionClass.name: LeaveResponse
interactionClass.semantics: Process a Client application’s request to leave a DDCA event.

parameter.name: MasterID
parameter.semantics: Unique identifier of the Master application

parameter.name: Response
parameter.semantics: Enumerated leave status response

parameter.name: ClientID
parameter.semantics: Unique identifier of the participant

interactionClass.name: JoinResponse
interactionClass.semantics: Process a Client application’s request to join a DDCA event.

parameter.name: MasterID
parameter.semantics: Unique identifier of the Master application

parameter.name: Response
parameter.semantics: Enumerated join status response

parameter.name: ClientID
parameter.semantics: Unique identifier of the participant

interactionClass.name: AddBookmark
interactionClass.semantics: Add a bookmark to the log.

parameter.name: Name
parameter.semantics: name of the bookmark

parameter.name: Time
parameter.semantics: recorder time, in ns, of the bookmark. Use -1 to indicate to client to use its current elapsed log time.

parameter.name: Description
parameter.semantics: description of the bookmark

parameter.name: CustomData
parameter.semantics: Array of custom string data

interactionClass.name: RemoveBookmark
interactionClass.semantics: Used to remove a bookmark from a recording.

parameter.name: Name
parameter.semantics: Remove bookmark with the specified name.

interactionClass.name: ListBookmarks
interactionClass.semantics: Control message to instruct clients to return a ListBookmarksResponse

interactionClass.name: GotoBookmark
interactionClass.semantics: Seek to the time of the named bookmark.

parameter.name: Name
parameter.semantics: The name of the bookmark

parameter.name: Name
parameter.semantics: The name of the channel to export

interactionClass.name: Record
interactionClass.semantics: Request the client to start a recording N.B. Not part of the DDCA standard

interactionClass.name: DdcaClientInteraction
interactionClass.semantics: Represents a DDCA client message.

interactionClass.name: Error
interactionClass.semantics: The Error message is sent anytime a Client application experiences an error condition. Information in this message includes error code, error level, and a description of the error.

parameter.name: ErrorCode
parameter.semantics: Client-defined error code

parameter.name: ErrorLevel
parameter.semantics: Level of error

parameter.name: DataLength
parameter.semantics: Length of error data

parameter.name: ErrorData
parameter.semantics: Description of the error condition

interactionClass.name: JoinRequest
interactionClass.semantics: This message is sent when a Client application is requesting to join a DDCA event. If accepted, the Client application shall transition from the UNJOINED state to the READY state.

parameter.name: ClientID
parameter.semantics: Unique identifier of the Client application

parameter.name: NameLength
parameter.semantics: Indicates the length of the Name field

parameter.name: Name
parameter.semantics: Name of the Client application

interactionClass.name: LeaveRequest
interactionClass.semantics: This message is sent when a Client application is requesting to leave a DDCA event. Upon acknowledgement, the Client application shall transition into the UNJOINED state and is free to join other DDCA events

parameter.name: ClientID
parameter.semantics: Unique identifier of the Client application

interactionClass.name: Acknowledge
interactionClass.semantics: Many of the messages sent by the Master application are acknowledged by the Client application. Examples include: Sync, Join, Leave, Close, and Load. The components of an Acknowledge message sent by the Client application include the message ID being responded to (message ID), the Acknowledge State (Ack State), and the Client application’s current state (CurrentState)

parameter.name: MasterMessageID
parameter.semantics: Unique identifier of the message sent from the DDCA master application

parameter.name: AckState
parameter.semantics: Status of Acknowledge

parameter.name: CurrentState
parameter.semantics: Current state

interactionClass.name: ListResponse
interactionClass.semantics: This message is sent when a Client application has received the List Control message from the DDCA Master application. Upon receipt of this message, the Client application shall immediately send an Acknowledge message with the Acknowledge State field set to “WaitingToComplete” and the CurrentState set to READY. When the Client application has retrieved its list, it shall send its list of all available sessions to the Master application via the ListResponse message

parameter.name: NumSessions
parameter.semantics: Number of Session Data records contained in the ListResponse message

parameter.name: ClientID
parameter.semantics: Unique identifier of the Client application

parameter.name: SessionData
parameter.semantics: Array of SessionData

interactionClass.name: LoadResponse
interactionClass.semantics: Upon receipt of the Load Control message, the Client application shall immediately send an Acknowledge message with the Acknowledge State field set to WaitingToComplete and the CurrentState set to READY. Client application(s) shall then load any recording(s) that match the DataTime window specified in the Load Control message

parameter.name: NumSessions
parameter.semantics: Number of Session Data records loaded by the Client application

parameter.name: ClientID
parameter.semantics: Unique identifier of the Client application

interactionClass.name: StatusResponse
interactionClass.semantics: This message is sent when a Client application is reporting its status to the DDCA Master application. If in the UNJOINED state, the Client application shall respond to any Status Request Control message received. If in any other state, the Client application shall respond only to Status Request Control messages from the Master application it is joined to. A StatusResponse message may be issued in any state, and results in no state transitions.

parameter.name: ClientId
parameter.semantics: Unique identifier of the Client application

parameter.name: CurrentState
parameter.semantics: Current state

parameter.name: NameLength
parameter.semantics: Indicates the length of the Name field

parameter.name: Name
parameter.semantics: Name of the Client application

interactionClass.name: DdcaCompatibilityResponse
interactionClass.semantics:
The DDCACompatibilityResponse message is sent when the Client application is reporting its compatibility level for DDCA interoperability to the Master application.
N.B. SISO-STD-015-2016 does not list the CompatibilityLevel field - seems to be an oversight.

parameter.name: CompatibilityLevel
parameter.semantics: Enumerated value representing DDCA compatibility level

interactionClass.name: ListBookmarksResponse
interactionClass.semantics: Send in response to a ListBookmarks interaction.

parameter.name: BookmarkList
parameter.semantics: list of all bookmarks

interactionClass.name: DDCAX
interactionClass.semantics: The DDCA-X message can be sent by either a Master or a Client application. DDCA-X messages are designed to provide a variable payload section, similar to that of a DIS Set Data Pdu. The variable payload section may contain any content as specified by the sender of the message. Senders and recipients of DDCA-X message(s) must have a shared understanding of the DDCA-X payload prior to using the message.

parameter.name: DataID
parameter.semantics: Identifier for the data field

parameter.name: DataLength
parameter.semantics: Length of the data field, in bytes

parameter.name: Data
parameter.semantics: Contents of the data field

parameter.name: ChannelName
parameter.semantics: The name of the IRC channel the message was sent in

parameter.name: SenderId
parameter.semantics: The unique id of the message sender

parameter.name: SenderNick
parameter.semantics: The IRC nick of the message sender

parameter.name: Message
parameter.semantics: The IRC message

parameter.name: TimeSent
parameter.semantics: Epoch timestamp sent at message transimission

parameter.name: TimeReceived
parameter.semantics: Epoch timestamp sent at message transimission

parameter.name: SenderId
parameter.semantics: ServerId unique id for the sender

parameter.name: SenderNick
parameter.semantics: The IRC nick of the sender

interactionClass.name: Service
interactionClass.semantics: Scaffolding class to denote a service interaction

interactionClass.name: Message
interactionClass.semantics: General purpose message interaction with a free text attribute and a variable datum set array

parameter.name: Id
parameter.semantics: Unique id for this error

parameter.name: FederateName
parameter.semantics: Name of federate that generated the error.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.semantics: The message text.

parameter.name: Timestamp
parameter.semantics: Time of the error

parameter.name: Level
parameter.semantics: The level of the message

interactionClass.name: WeatherBase
interactionClass.semantics: Base class for all requests and responses.

parameter.name: InstanceID
parameter.semantics: The ID of weather instance of interest.

interactionClass.name: WeatherRequestLocation
interactionClass.semantics: Request to get the weather at a particular instant at a particular location. Results in a WeatherResponse interaction.

parameter.name: WeatherData
parameter.semantics: The time, location and domain information necessary to make the weather request.

interactionClass.name: WeatherRequestLocationList
interactionClass.semantics: Request for multiple, independent weather requests. Results in a WeatherResponseList

parameter.name: WeatherRequestDataList
parameter.semantics: Array of the weather data.

interactionClass.name: WeatherRequestLOSBase
interactionClass.semantics: Base class line of sight requests.

parameter.name: Sensitivity
parameter.semantics: A number between 0.0 and 1.0 that specifies the sensitivity of the change detection algorithm. Low sensitivities will respond only to large changes in weather conditions and produce a smaller number of segments, with 0.0 creating segments with a minimum length of 10km. High sensitivities produce a larger number of segments, with 1.0 creating segments with a minimum length of 100m. The default sensitivity is 0.5, which corresponds to a minimum segment length of 1km.

interactionClass.name: WeatherRequestLOSIDBase
interactionClass.semantics: Base class for LOS weather requests.

parameter.name: ID
parameter.semantics: The ID record for the interaction.

parameter.name: TimeOffset
parameter.semantics: Time offset since the start of the instance, seconds.

parameter.name: LOSElements
parameter.semantics: The data types of interest.

parameter.name: StartLocation
parameter.semantics: The start of the line of sight vector.

interactionClass.name: WeatherRequestBetweenLocations
interactionClass.semantics: Query the weather conditions between two points. Results in a WeatherSegmentResponse.

parameter.name: EndLocation
parameter.semantics: The end of the line of sight vector.

interactionClass.name: WeatherRequestAlongPath
interactionClass.semantics: Weather request along a vector with the given direction and path length. Results in a WeatherSegmentResponse.

parameter.name: Direction
parameter.semantics: The azimuth from location as a compass angle in degrees, with 0 as north, 90 as east, etc. The elevation from location as an angle in degrees in the range -90 .. 90 with positive up

parameter.name: Length
parameter.semantics: The length of the path, m.

interactionClass.name: WeatherRequestLOSIDListBase
interactionClass.semantics: Base class for LOS list interactions.

parameter.name: IDs
parameter.semantics: List ID records.

parameter.name: TimeOffsets
parameter.semantics: Array of TimeOffsets.

parameter.name: LOSElements
parameter.semantics: List of LOSElements of interest.

parameter.name: StartLocations
parameter.semantics: Array of the start locations for the LOS requests.

interactionClass.name: WeatherRequestBetweenLocationsList
interactionClass.semantics: Multiple, independent LOS requests between two points. Results in a WeatherSegmentResponseList.

parameter.name: EndLocations
parameter.semantics: Array of the end locations for the LOS requests.

interactionClass.name: WeatherRequestAlongPathList
interactionClass.semantics: Multiple, independent path requests. Results in a WeatherSegmentResponse.

parameter.name: Directions
parameter.semantics: Array of direction vectors.

parameter.name: Lengths
parameter.semantics: Array of path lengths.

interactionClass.name: WeatherResponse
interactionClass.semantics: Weather responses for single requests.

parameter.name: ResponseData
parameter.semantics: The data for the response.

interactionClass.name: SetActiveWeatherInstance
interactionClass.semantics: Set the active weather instance for querying.

parameter.name: Active
parameter.semantics: Set true if the supplied ID is that of the active weather instance, false otherwise

interactionClass.name: WeatherResponseList
interactionClass.semantics: A list of weather responses. Sent after a WeatherRequestLocationList is received.

parameter.name: WeatherResponseDataList
parameter.semantics: An array of all the responses.

interactionClass.name: WeatherSegmentResponse
interactionClass.semantics: Response to a path request.

parameter.name: SegmentData
parameter.semantics: The data for the LOS request.

interactionClass.name: WeatherSegmentResponseList
interactionClass.semantics: List variant for multiple LOS responses.

parameter.name: SegmentData
parameter.semantics: Array of the LOS responses.

interactionClass.name: AccumulationRequest
interactionClass.semantics: A request for the accumulated precipitation at the given location.

parameter.name: ID
parameter.semantics: Identifier record to allow the user to match requests and responses.

parameter.name: TimeOffset
parameter.semantics: Time offset since the start of the instance, seconds.

parameter.name: Location
parameter.semantics: Location of the request.

parameter.name: TimePeriod
parameter.semantics: Time period of time of interest, backwards from the time offset, seconds.

interactionClass.name: AccumulationResponse
interactionClass.semantics: Data for accumulated precipitation at the given location.

parameter.name: ID
parameter.semantics: The ID of the response

parameter.name: Time
parameter.semantics: Date/Time of the response

parameter.name: TimeOffset
parameter.semantics: Time since the start of the instance, seconds

parameter.name: Location
parameter.semantics: Location of requested weather

parameter.name: Period
parameter.semantics: Period of precipitation accumulation, in seconds

parameter.name: Precipitation
parameter.semantics: List of PrecipitationPeriod records

enumeratedData.name: DdcaJoinLeaveResponseEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: DDCA supported values for Join / Leave responses

enumeratedData.name: DdcaCompatibilityLevelEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: The DDCACompatibility message is issued by the Master to request a Client to report its compatibility level for DDCA interoperability

enumeratedData.name: DdcaErrorLevelEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: DDCA shall support error levels. Client applications are encouraged to use best practices when determining the appropriate error level for a given message; i.e., avoid using Critical or Error level for engineering-level debugging messages

enumeratedData.name: DdcaClientStateEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: A Client application shall use the enumerated values to indicate the Client’s current state as well as the Client’s supported states. All Clients must support at least the Unjoined and Ready states. A DDCA Client application may be in exactly one state at any instance in time

enumeratedData.name: DdcaSyncPurposeEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: Purpose of the sync operation: Play, Stop, Pause, or Seek.

enumeratedData.name: DdcaSearchTypeEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: The SearchType field indicates what recordings are to be searched and returned by the Client application.

enumeratedData.name: SyncTimeTypeEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: Whether the time supplied to the current time field in the Sync interaction is a time of day (from the epoch), or an offset to the current time. BEGIN and END indicate that the log should seek to the beginning and end of the recording respectively.

enumeratedData.name: LevelType
enumeratedData.semantics: The log level of the associated message

enumeratedData.name: PrecipitationType
enumeratedData.semantics: Enum representing different kinds of precipitation

enumeratedData.name: WeatherInstanceType
enumeratedData.semantics: Describes the weather instance type. Real instances are created from historical weather data. Live instances are created from current and forecast weather data and are automatically updated as weather data is published. Standard weather instances are based on a standard atmosphere model and contain user-specified basic weather conditions

enumeratedData.name: StandardAtmosphereModel
enumeratedData.semantics: Describes the type of standard atmosphere model

enumeratedData.name: GeoAreaType
enumeratedData.semantics: Describes the type of a GeoArea. Currently only the Polygon type is supported

enumeratedData.name: Domain
enumeratedData.semantics: Represents a distinct set of weather elements. Weather instances store data for one or more domains.

enumeratedData.name: WeatherDataElement
enumeratedData.semantics: Describes the requested type of gridded weather data.

enumeratedData.name: LineOfSightElement
enumeratedData.semantics: Enumerates the possible values for a line of sight data request

arrayData.name: IRCChannelArray
arrayData.semantics: List of channel names on an IRC network.

arrayData.name: GeoPolygon
arrayData.semantics: A geographic area, represented as a list of geographic points in counterclockwise order.

arrayData.name: ArrayOfWeatherDataElement
arrayData.semantics: Array of weather data elements to update in a gridded data object.

arrayData.name: ArrayOfWeatherSegmentData
arrayData.semantics: Array of WeatherSegmentData used in WeatherSegmentResponseList

arrayData.name: ArrayOfWeatherResponseData
arrayData.semantics: Array of weather responses, used in WeatherResponseList

field.name: SessionIdentifier
field.semantics: Unique identifier of the Client session

field.name: StartTime
field.semantics: The starting DataTime for the Session, in seconds since 01-Jan-1970

field.name: EndTime
field.semantics: The ending DataTime for the Session, in seconds since 01-Jan-1970

field.name: NameLength
field.semantics: Length of the SessionName field in bytes

field.name: SessionName
field.semantics: Name of the Client session

field.name: Name
field.semantics: Bookmark name

field.name: RecorderTime
field.semantics: Bookmark time in ns

field.name: Description
field.semantics: Bookmark Description

field.name: CustomData
field.semantics: Array of custom string data.

fixedRecordData.name: DateTimeStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: A fixed record to start the date/time stamp

field.name: Year
field.semantics: Year value

field.name: Month
field.semantics: Month value

field.name: Day
field.semantics: Day Value

field.name: Hour
field.semantics: Hour value (in 24 hour notation)

field.name: Minute
field.semantics: Minute value

field.name: Second
field.semantics: Second value

field.name: Latitude
field.semantics: Latitude Value, decimal degrees.

field.name: Longitude
field.semantics: Longitude value, decimal degrees.

field.name: Altitude
field.semantics: Altitude, metres.

fixedRecordData.name: Orientation
fixedRecordData.semantics: Describes the direction of a vector for a path request.

field.name: Phi
field.semantics: Heading from north, degrees.

field.name: Psi
field.semantics: Pitch, -90 to 90, degrees.

field.name: Theta
field.semantics: Roll, degrees.

fixedRecordData.name: WeatherSegment
fixedRecordData.semantics: Represents the atmospheric conditions along a line segment at a specific date and time.

field.name: FromLocation
field.semantics: Geographic point in three dimensions.

field.name: ToLocation
field.semantics: Geographic point in three dimensions.

field.name: SegmentLength
field.semantics: Length of the segment, m.

field.name: ElementType
field.semantics: The type of the requested data.

field.name: ElementData
field.semantics: The value of the data type

fixedRecordData.name: GeoArea
fixedRecordData.semantics: A rectangular area defined by its lower left and upper right vertices.

field.name: LowerLeft
field.semantics: Lower left (south-west) corner of the area.

field.name: UpperRight
field.semantics: Upper right (north-east) corner of the area

field.name: Latitude
field.semantics: Latitude Value, decimal degrees.

field.name: Longitude
field.semantics: Longitude Value, decimal degrees.

fixedRecordData.name: GriddedDataElement
fixedRecordData.semantics: Represents a grid element containing a datum for a specified type of data (e.g. pressure, temperature).

field.name: Type
field.semantics: The type of weather data.

field.name: Values
field.semantics: The data for this element as a list of (NumSamplesX * NumSamplesY) values, ordered in rows starting from the top left (north-west) corner. Points where there is no data contain the NO_DATA_AVAILABLE value.

field.name: Top
field.semantics: The upper altitude of the cloud layer, in meters.

field.name: Base
field.semantics: The base altitude of the cloud layer, in meters.

field.name: Coverage
field.semantics: Cloud layer cloud coverage, as a percentage of the sky.

field.name: Type
field.semantics: Describes type of cloud present. Cirrus and Cirro* are high level clouds, Alto* are mid level clouds, and the rest are low level clouds

field.name: Temperature
field.semantics: Temperature of requested atmospheric weather, degrees celsius.

field.name: Pressure
field.semantics: Pressure of requested atmospheric weather, pascals.

field.name: MSLPressure
field.semantics: MSL Pressure of requested atmospheric weather, pascals.

field.name: WindDirection
field.semantics: Wind Direction of requested atmospheric weather. Compass bearing in degrees.

field.name: WindSpeed
field.semantics: Wind Speed of requested atmospheric weather, metres per second.

field.name: Humidity
field.semantics: Humidity of requested atmospheric weather, percentage.

field.name: VerticalWind
field.semantics: Vertical wind speed, in metres per second

field.name: Temperature
field.semantics: Temperature of requested ground weather, degrees celsius.

field.name: Pressure
field.semantics: Pressure of requested ground weather, pascals.

field.name: MSLPressure
field.semantics: MSL Pressure of request ground weather, pascals.

field.name: Humidity
field.semantics: Humidity of requested ground weather, percentage.

field.name: WindDirection
field.semantics: Wind Direction of requested ground weather, compass bearing in degrees.

field.name: WindSpeed
field.semantics: Wind Speed of requested ground weather, metres per second.

field.name: WindGust
field.semantics: Wind Gust of requested ground weather, metres per second.

field.name: TotalCloudCover
field.semantics: Total cloud coverage, as a percentage of the sky.

field.name: PrecipitationRate
field.semantics: Precipitation Rate of requested ground weather, mm/hr.

field.name: ConvecPrecipitationRate
field.semantics: Convec Precipitation Rate of requested ground weather, mm/hr.

field.name: PrecipitationType
field.semantics: Precipitation Type of requested ground weather.

field.name: Visibility
field.semantics: Visibility of requested ground weather, metres.

field.name: CloudCeiling
field.semantics: Cloud ceiling, in metres above ground level

field.name: Lightning
field.semantics: Lightning prevalence, expressed as the probability of lightning occurring.

fixedRecordData.name: RequestIdentifier
fixedRecordData.semantics: An identifier for a request. The user may use one or more of these to identify a request so that it can be paired with a response.

field.name: UUID
field.semantics: UUID to uniquely identify the message.

field.name: EntityIdentifier
field.semantics: The DIS Entity ID triplet (optional).

field.name: Callsign
field.semantics: The entity callsign (optional).

field.name: ID
field.semantics: Identifier record to allow the user to match requests and responses.

field.name: TimeOffset
field.semantics: Time offset since the start of the instance, seconds.

field.name: Location
field.semantics: Location of the request.

field.name: Domains
field.semantics: The weather domains of interest

fixedRecordData.name: CloudResponseData
fixedRecordData.semantics: Data for a cloud layer response.

field.name: TotalCloudCover
field.semantics: Total Cloud Cover of requested Cloud Layer weather as a percentage.

field.name: CloudCeiling
field.semantics: Cloud ceiling, in metres above ground level

field.name: HighCloud
field.semantics: Describes the high cloud layer.

field.name: MidCloud
field.semantics: Describes the mid cloud layer.

field.name: LowCloud
field.semantics: Describes the low cloud layer.

field.name: ConvecCloud
field.semantics: Describes the convective cloud layer.

field.name: PrecipitationRate
field.semantics: Precipitation rate, in mm/hr.

field.name: ConvecPrecipitationRate
field.semantics: Convec Precipitation Rate of requested Cloud Layer weather, mm/hr.

field.name: PrecipitationType
field.semantics: Precipitation Type of requested Cloud Layer weather.

field.name: Lightning
field.semantics: Lightning prevalence, expressed as the probability of lightning occurring.

field.name: WindDirection
field.semantics: Direction wind is blowing from, compass angle in degrees.

field.name: WindSpeed
field.semantics: Wind speed, metres per second.

field.name: TotalWaveHeight
field.semantics: Significant height of combined wind waves and swell, metres.

field.name: WindWaveHeight
field.semantics: Significant height of wind waves, metres.

field.name: WindWavePeriod
field.semantics: Mean period of wind waves, seconds.

field.name: WindWaveDirection
field.semantics: Direction of wind waves, compass degrees.

field.name: PrimaryWavePeriod
field.semantics: Mean period of primary waves, seconds.

field.name: PrimaryWaveDirection
field.semantics: Direction of primary waves, compass degrees.

field.name: SwellHeight
field.semantics: Significant height of swell, metres.

field.name: SwellPeriod
field.semantics: Mean period of swell waves, seconds.

field.name: SwellDirection
field.semantics: Direction of swell waves, compass degrees.

field.name: Temperature
field.semantics: Temperature, degrees Celsius.

field.name: Salinity
field.semantics: Salinity, PSU (g/kg).

field.name: CurrentSpeed
field.semantics: Current speed, metres per second.

field.name: CurrentDirection
field.semantics: Current direction, in compass degrees.

field.name: ID
field.semantics: The ID of the response.

field.name: Time
field.semantics: Date/Time of the response.

field.name: TimeOffset
field.semantics: Time since the start of the instance, seconds.

field.name: Location
field.semantics: Position of requested weather.

field.name: ResponseDataVariant
field.semantics: Array of variants containing the data of the requested type.

fixedRecordData.name: WeatherSegmentData
fixedRecordData.semantics: Data type for weather segments returned from LOS requests.

field.name: UUID
field.semantics: Unique identifier for this response, matched with request.

field.name: DateTime
field.semantics: Date time of weather segment data.

field.name: TimeOffset
field.semantics: Time since the start of the instance, seconds.

field.name: SegmentArrays
field.semantics: Array of arrays of weather segments corresponding to areas of changing weather (e.g. temperature, pressure, visibility).

fixedRecordData.name: PrecipitationPeriod
fixedRecordData.semantics: Describes a period of precipitation accumulation, mm/hr.

field.name: Type
field.semantics: Describes the kind of precipitation

field.name: Period
field.semantics: Period of accumulation, seconds

field.name: Total
field.semantics: Accumulated precipitation, millimetres
